participant_1.background:
I want a home with a secure bike parking space and a place to plug in my tablet.
My social media presence is part of my job, so I try to keep it up-to-date and interesting.
I am too strict with my soldiers, sometimes I make them do things that are too dangerous.
I work 60 hours a week so I can't go to the game, but I'll be cheering from home!
I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape.

participant_2.background:
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.
i have three roommates.
i enjoy talking to strangers.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
my masters degree is in italian literature.

content.text: Hi, I'm Sarah. I'm a huge fan of the drums!
Hi Sarah, I'm John. I love playing the drums too!
That's so cool! What kind of drums do you play?
I play on an acoustic set. What about you?
I play on an electronic set.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to try out an electronic set.
You should! They're a lot of fun.
Maybe I will someday.
Hey, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of software do you work on?
I work on a lot of different types of software, but my main focus is on web development.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm a big fan of web development.
That's cool! What's your favorite thing about web development?
I love the challenge of creating something new and innovative.
I totally agree! It's so satisfying to see your work come to life.
I know right? It's the best feeling ever.
It really is.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing about my job is the people I work with.
That's awesome! I love working with a great team.
Me too! It makes all the difference.
